com.orange.api.rfid.ale.server.controller
Class ALEControllerImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.orange.api.rfid.ale.server.controller.ALEControllerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ALEController
public class ALEControllerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ALEController

this class is a webservice wich is control ALE. Can stop/start/... ECSpec and get and and load all configuration for one ALE server.

Author:
benoit plomion
